title: Automatically logged into account that isnt my own.
body:
I just tried to log into the forums, as it for some reason had forgotten me. When I went to log in, this accounts details were automatically filled in. Doubting it I entered the captcha and logged in, and here I am. I have never logged into this account before or had someone else access my computer. I believe my ISP's dynamic IP addresses caused this issue, and I don't want someone on my account because of my bad internet company.

I don't know if riot can stop this from happening again, but it needs to be mentioned.

replies.body:
pffft

just fyi the boards had an issue were certain people couldn't log in for a while (read: internal server error).
